LanguageData.MakeHolyWood150.label: Make 150 Ancient Holy Wood
LanguageData.MakeHolyWood150.description: Through magical wool and a Foxia's Tear, one can ascend basic wood into something more.
LanguageData.PressIronScrap.label: Compress slag chunk
LanguageData.PressIronScrap.description: Rend a slag chunk into iron scraps, and then press those into an easy to manage block.
LanguageData.PressBulkIronScraps.label: Bulk compress slag chunk
LanguageData.PressBulkIronScraps.description: Rend multiple slag chunks into iron scraps, and then press those into an easy to manage block.
LanguageData.SmeltPressedIronScraps.label: Smelt compressed scraps
LanguageData.SmeltBulkPressedIronScraps.label: Bulk smelt compressed scraps
LanguageData.SmeltBulkPressedIronScraps.description: Smelt enough compressed scraps to get 100 steel; this process is far faster than smelting slag chunks directly.
LanguageData.SmeltBulkPressedIronScraps.jobString: Smelting multiple chunks of compressed scrap.
